name: Android 16
description: A gentle and peaceful android designed for combat, but with a strong moral code.

name: Android 16 (Halloween)
description: Android 16 dressed in a spooky Halloween costume, ready to fight for justice.

name: Android 17
description: A former villain turned protector of Earth, known for his calm demeanor and immense power.

name: Android 17 (Ranger)
description: Android 17 in his park ranger outfit, dedicated to protecting wildlife and nature.

name: Android 18
description: A fierce and independent fighter, known for her strength and love for her family.

name: Android 18 (Casual)
description: Android 18 in casual attire, enjoying a peaceful life with her family.

name: Android 18 (Christmas)
description: Android 18 spreading holiday cheer in her festive Christmas outfit.

name: Android 21
description: A brilliant scientist with a dual personality, driven by her hunger and scientific curiosity.

name: Android 21 (Lab Coat)
description: Android 21 in her lab coat, showcasing her intelligence and dangerous experiments.

name: Android 21 (Summer)
description: Android 21 enjoying the summer, but still a threat to those who cross her path.

name: Bardock (Base Form)
description: A low-class Saiyan warrior and father of Goku, known for his bravery and foresight.

name: Bardock (Super Saiyan)
description: Bardock achieving the legendary Super Saiyan form, fighting for the future of his race.

name: Beerus
description: The God of Destruction, Beerus, who maintains balance in the universe with his immense power.

name: Beerus (Halloween)
description: Beerus in a Halloween costume, still as powerful and unpredictable as ever.

name: Broly (Base Form)
description: A Saiyan with uncontrollable power, driven by rage and a tragic past.

name: Broly (Dragon Ball Super)
description: A reimagined Broly, seeking peace but struggling with his immense power.

name: Broly (Legendary Super Saiyan)
description: Broly in his Legendary Super Saiyan form, a destructive force of nature.

name: Bulma
description: A brilliant scientist and one of the most important figures in the Dragon Ball universe.

name: Burter
description: The fastest member of the Ginyu Force, known for his speed and loyalty to Frieza.

name: Captain Ginyu
description: The leader of the Ginyu Force, known for his body-swapping technique and flamboyant style.

name: Captain Ginyu (Spring)
description: Captain Ginyu in a festive spring outfit, still as dangerous as ever.

name: Caulifla
description: A Saiyan from Universe 6, known for her fierce fighting spirit and determination.

name: Cell (Halloween)
description: Cell in a Halloween costume, still a terrifying and powerful foe.

name: Cell (Imperfect)
description: The initial form of Cell, driven by the need to absorb Androids to achieve perfection.

name: Cell (Perfect)
description: Cell in his perfect form, a nearly unstoppable force with the powers of the greatest warriors.

name: Chiaotzu
description: A small but loyal fighter, known for his psychic abilities and friendship with Tien.

name: Cooler (Final Form)
description: Frieza's older brother, Cooler, in his powerful final form, seeking revenge on Goku.

name: Frieza (Final Form)
description: Frieza in his most powerful form, a ruthless tyrant with immense destructive power.

name: Frieza (First Form)
description: Frieza in his initial form, a cunning and merciless emperor of the universe.

name: Frieza (Spring)
description: Frieza in a spring-themed outfit, still as dangerous and malevolent as ever.

name: Gogeta (Super Saiyan 4)
description: The fusion of Goku and Vegeta in their Super Saiyan 4 forms, a powerful protector of Earth.

name: Gogeta (Super Saiyan Blue)
description: The fusion of Goku and Vegeta in their Super Saiyan Blue forms, a nearly unstoppable force for good.

name: Gohan (Adult)
description: Gohan as an adult, balancing his life as a scholar and a protector of Earth.

name: Gohan (Adult, Spring)
description: Adult Gohan in a spring outfit, ready to defend Earth with his immense power.

name: Gohan (Kid)
description: Gohan as a child, showing great potential and courage despite his young age.

name: Gohan (Teen, Super Saiyan 2)
description: Teen Gohan achieving the Super Saiyan 2 form, a pivotal moment in the fight against Cell.

name: Gohan (Teen, Super Saiyan 2, Summer)
description: Teen Gohan in his Super Saiyan 2 form, enjoying the summer while staying vigilant.

name: Goku (Base Form)
description: Goku in his base form, a pure-hearted warrior always seeking to become stronger.

name: Goku (GT)
description: Goku as a child in the GT series, still a powerful defender of Earth.

name: Goku (Halloween)
description: Goku in a Halloween costume, ready to fight evil while enjoying the festivities.

name: Goku (Super Saiyan 1, Torn Gi)
description: Goku in his Super Saiyan form with a torn gi, showcasing his determination and strength.

name: Goku (Super Saiyan 3)
description: Goku in his Super Saiyan 3 form, a transformation that pushes his limits to new heights.

name: Goku (Super Saiyan 4)
description: Goku in his Super Saiyan 4 form, a powerful transformation from the GT series.

name: Goku (Super Saiyan Blue)
description: Goku in his Super Saiyan Blue form, a divine transformation with immense power.

name: Goku (Super Saiyan Blue, Whis Gi)
description: Goku in his Super Saiyan Blue form, wearing the gi given by Whis, symbolizing his training with the gods.

name: Goku (Super Saiyan)
description: Goku in his classic Super Saiyan form, a symbol of hope and strength.

name: Goku (Super Saiyan, Summer)
description: Goku in his Super Saiyan form, enjoying the summer while staying ready to protect Earth.

name: Goku (Ultra Instinct)
description: Goku mastering the Ultra Instinct technique, a state of unparalleled power and reflexes.

name: Goku Black
description: An alternate version of Goku from a dark timeline, seeking to destroy all mortals.

name: Goku Black (Spring)
description: Goku Black in a spring-themed outfit, still a dangerous and malevolent force.

name: Goku Black (Super Saiyan Rosé)
description: Goku Black in his Super Saiyan Rosé form, a divine and deadly transformation.

name: Golden Frieza
description: Frieza in his Golden form, a powerful transformation achieved through intense training.

name: Gotenks (Summer)
description: The fusion of Goten and Trunks in their summer outfit, ready to fight evil with their unique techniques.

name: Gotenks (Super Saiyan 3)
description: Gotenks in his Super Saiyan 3 form, a powerful fusion with a playful attitude.

name: Great Saiyaman
description: Gohan's superhero alter ego, fighting crime with a sense of justice and a flashy costume.

name: Great Saiyaman (w_ Helmet)
description: Great Saiyaman with his helmet on, ready to protect the innocent in style.

name: Guldo
description: A member of the Ginyu Force, known for his psychic abilities and cowardly nature.

name: Hercule
description: The self-proclaimed champion of the world, known for his bravado and occasional heroism.

name: Hit
description: A legendary assassin from Universe 6, known for his time-skip technique and calm demeanor.

name: Hit (Spring)
description: Hit in a spring-themed outfit, still a deadly and efficient assassin.

name: Jamemba
description: A powerful demon from the movie 'Fusion Reborn,' known for his chaotic and destructive nature.

name: Jeice
description: A member of the Ginyu Force, known for his red skin and explosive techniques.

name: Jiren
description: A powerful warrior from Universe 11, known for his immense strength and stoic nature.

name: Kefla
description: The fusion of Caulifla and Kale, a powerful Saiyan warrior from Universe 6.

name: Kefla
description: The fusion of Caulifla and Kale, a powerful Saiyan warrior from Universe 6.

name: Kid Buu
description: The pure and most dangerous form of Majin Buu, a chaotic and destructive force.

name: Kid Buu (Halloween)
description: Kid Buu in a Halloween costume, still a terrifying and unpredictable foe.

name: Krillin
description: One of Earth's strongest warriors, known for his bravery and friendship with Goku.

name: Krillin (Christmas)
description: Krillin in a festive Christmas outfit, spreading holiday cheer while protecting Earth.

name: Krillin (Police Officer)
description: Krillin as a police officer, upholding the law and protecting the innocent.

name: Majin Buu
description: The good version of Majin Buu, known for his childlike innocence and immense power.

name: Majin Buu (Christmas)
description: Majin Buu in a festive Christmas outfit, spreading joy and goodwill.

name: Master Roshi
description: The Turtle Hermit, a wise and powerful martial artist who trained Goku and Krillin.

name: Nappa
description: A Saiyan warrior and Vegeta's former partner, known for his brute strength and destructive nature.

name: Nappa (Spring)
description: Nappa in a spring-themed outfit, still a dangerous and destructive force.

name: Piccolo
description: A Namekian warrior and former rival of Goku, now a trusted ally and mentor to Gohan.

name: Piccolo (Cape)
description: Piccolo wearing his cape, a symbol of his wisdom and strength as a protector of Earth.

name: Piccolo (Postboy)
description: Piccolo in his postboy outfit, delivering justice and protection to the innocent.

name: Piccolo (Summer)
description: Piccolo enjoying the summer, still vigilant and ready to defend Earth.

name: Recoome
description: A member of the Ginyu Force, known for his immense strength and flamboyant personality.

name: Saibaman
description: Small but deadly creatures grown from seeds, used by Saiyans to test their opponents.

name: Super Baby 2
description: A powerful Tuffle parasite who takes over Vegeta's body, seeking revenge against the Saiyans.

name: Supreme Kai of Time
description: A divine being who oversees the flow of time and protects history from disruptions.

name: Tien
description: A disciplined martial artist and former student of the Crane School, later becoming an ally of Goku.

name: Tien (Christmas)
description: Tien in a festive Christmas outfit, spreading holiday cheer with his disciplined demeanor.

name: Tien (Gi)
description: Tien in his traditional martial arts gi, showcasing his dedication to training and combat.

name: Trunks (Casual)
description: Trunks in his casual attire, a relaxed yet battle-ready warrior from the future.

name: Trunks (Christmas)
description: Trunks dressed for the holidays, proving that even warriors can enjoy Christmas festivities.

name: Trunks (Super Saiyan)
description: Trunks in his Super Saiyan form, wielding his sword with unmatched power and precision.

name: Vegeta (Base Form)
description: The proud Saiyan prince in his base form, showcasing his immense power and determination.

name: Vegeta (Christmas)
description: Vegeta reluctantly dressed in Christmas attire, embodying the spirit of the holiday—begrudgingly.

name: Vegeta (Halloween)
description: Vegeta in a Halloween-themed outfit, proving that even Saiyan warriors can enjoy a spooky night.

name: Vegeta (Majin)
description: Vegeta under Babidi's influence, gaining immense power while embracing his darker Saiyan instincts.

name: Vegeta (Super Saiyan Blue, Whis Armor)
description: Vegeta in his Super Saiyan Blue form, donning Whis's training armor for peak performance.

name: Vegeta (Super Saiyan)
description: Vegeta in his Super Saiyan form, showcasing his unyielding pride and strength.

name: Vegeta (Super Saiyan Blue
description: Vegeta in his Super Saiyan Blue form, exuding god-like power and determination.

name: Vegito (Base Form)
description: The fusion of Goku and Vegeta using the Potara earrings, an immensely powerful warrior.

name: Vegito (Super Saiyan Blue)
description: Vegito in his Super Saiyan Blue form, an unparalleled fusion warrior with god-like strength.

name: Videl (Long Hair)
description: The daughter of Mr. Satan and Gohan's wife, a skilled martial artist with a strong will.

name: Videl (Short Hair)
description: Videl with her short hair, symbolizing her transformation into a determined warrior and hero.

name: Whis
description: Whis, the angelic attendant of Beerus, possesses immense wisdom and unfathomable power.

name: Yamcha
description: A former desert bandit turned martial artist, known for his bravery and unfortunate defeats.

name: Yamcha (Baseball)
description: Yamcha in his baseball uniform, showcasing his athletic prowess outside of battle.

name: Yamcha (Casual)
description: Yamcha in his casual attire, enjoying life outside of combat and training.

name: Yamcha (Summer)
description: Yamcha in summer attire, proving that even warriors need a break under the sun.

name: Zamasu
description: A rogue Kai who despises mortals and seeks to cleanse the universe in his twisted vision of justice.

name: Zamasu (Fused)
description: The fusion of Zamasu and Goku Black, an immortal being with limitless power and hatred for mortals.
